info.name: Hide Toolbar Grippies a.k.a. Lock Toolbars
info.description: Hides the "grippy" at the start of the toolbars in SeaMonkey.  For those who don't really use the grippies and would want to reclaim some toolbar space, or just want a cleaner UI.  Note, this hides the grippies from all toolbars in all windows.
